name: Color Dragon
description:
Dodge, dash and race to the top of the leaderboard in this exciting arcade game!

Control a dragon in a colorful labyrinth. Match the dragon's color to the color of the obstacle to destroy it! Form words by collecting letters to unlock amazing customization options! Grab stars to get that elusive high score and show your friends who's boss!

Are you ready to ssslither through to the top? Install now to enjoy this amazing arcade game brought to you by Tap Tap Games by Huuuge!
